item.title: Seniors online statistics (US)
item.description: December 10th, 2009 | by Ben Parr View comments23 Comments and 719 Reactions The research confirmed a trend that weâ€™ve seen in recent years: that more seniors are becoming active on the web. In November of 2004, there were 11.3 million active seniors online. In November 2009, that number jumped by 55% to 17.5 million. In addition, they spend more time on the web, totaling an average of 58 hours a month in front of the browser.
